definition: polygon/same as 多邊形|多边形
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Other polygons form two groups depending on their subspace.
sentences.chinese: 其他多角形根據他們的子空間形成兩個小組。

sentences.english: The pinealocytes were round and polygon, and cells grew much bigger as the time going on.
sentences.chinese: 細胞多呈圓形或多角形，細胞體積有增大趨勢。

sentences.english: You can set the number of polygon sections that determine the resolution of the mouth interior.
sentences.chinese: 您能設置的多角形部分的數量確定嘴內部的決議。

sentences.english: E. g. Boundaries of the polygon may extend to infinity.
sentences.chinese: 多角形的邊界可以延伸到無窮遠處。

sentences.english: The hepatic lobule is not clear. Hepatic cells are egg-like or polygon.
sentences.chinese: 肝小葉不明顯，肝細胞呈卵圓形或多角形。

sentences.english: At the same time convert the angle of the polygon at that vertex into a straight angle.
sentences.chinese: 同時把該頂點處多角形的角轉換成平角。

sentences.english: You should resize the polygons a little to remove the problem.
sentences.chinese: 你應該稍微調整多角形大小移除問題。

sentences.english: The created polygons will always face the view.
sentences.chinese: 被創造的多角形總將面對看法。

sentences.english: These famous buildings are based on circles and polygons.
sentences.chinese: 這些名建築是以圓形和多角形爲基礎而設計建造。

sentences.english: How many diagonals does this seven-sided polygon have?
sentences.chinese: 請問這個七邊的多角形有多少條對角線？
